verses.verse: Verily <S%G281><s%> , verily <S%G281><s%> , I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , He that entereth <S%G1525><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sheepfold <S%G4263%G833><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> climbeth up <S%G305><s%> some other way <S%G237><s%> , the same <S%G1565><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a thief <S%G2812><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a robber <S%G3027><s%> .

To him <S%G5129><s%> the porter <S%G2377><s%> openeth <S%G455><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> the sheep <S%G4263><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> he calleth <S%G2564><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> leadeth <S%G1806><s%> them <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1806><s%> .

<S%G5026>This<s%> <S%G3942>parable<s%> <S%G2036>spake<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1565>they<s%> <S%G1097>understood<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> what <S%G5101>things<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G2980>spake<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> , verily <S%G281><s%> , I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213%G3754><s%> , I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> of the sheep <S%G4263><s%> .
